posts.description: Man accidentally 'deletes his entire company' with one line of bad code | News | Lifestyle | The Independent
posts.extended: Do you have an old broken smartphone lying around the house somewhere? Then why not turn it into a robot? That's exactly what YouTuber Mehdi Sadaghdar did in a recent video, after his efforts to bring a destroyed phone back to life disastrously failed.

posts.description: BuzzFeed Product Design Roles 2.0 — BuzzFeed Design — Medium
posts.extended: In spring of 2015, I left a job I loved to become a design manager at BuzzFeed, excited to tackle new challenges in a new organization. Having spent more than seven years in one place, it was naturally a bittersweet time.
